message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you our premium product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $900,000. This is a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable product at a competitive price.

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, I'm looking to secure this product for a slightly lower price.  Considering the value it holds for you, I believe $850,000 would be a fair price for both of us.  This would allow me to acquire the product without exceeding my budget while still providing you with a profitable sale.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the market value of the product, I'm willing to consider a slightly higher offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875,000. This is a fair compromise that still allows me to earn a significant profit while meeting your budget constraints.
